title: Life expectancy in North America 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Life expectancy in years on the Y-axis for 3 different Countrys for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years in Country Canada and Males had the lowest Life expectancy in years in Country North America.
Among all the Countrys, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years in Country Canada and lowest Life expectancy in years in Country North America.
The maximum Life expectancy in years for Females that was found in Country Canada was 1.04 times larger than the minimum Life expectancy in years observed in Country North America.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Life expectancy in years on the Y-axis for 3 different Countrys for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years in Country Canada and Males had the lowest Life expectancy in years in Country North America.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Life expectancy in years on the Y-axis for 3 different Countrys for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years in Country Canada and Males had the lowest Life expectancy in years in Country North America.
Among all the Countrys, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years in Country Canada and lowest Life expectancy in years in Country North America.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Life expectancy in years on the Y-axis for 3 different Countrys for 2 groups Males, and Females that are presented on the X-axis.
In Country Canada, Females had the highest Life expectancy in years 84.0 among the 2 groups and in North America, Males had the lowest Life expectancy in years 76.0.
In Country Canada, Females had the maximum Life expectancy in years and it saw the lowest in Country North America out of all 3 Countrys.
There is a gap of 3.0 between the highest and lowest Life expectancy in years found for Females in Country Canada and North America.
Among all 2 groups, Males had the gap of 4.0 between the maximum and minimum Life expectancy in years observed in Country Canada and North America respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Males, and Females, the Country Canada is the maximum Life expectancy in years and North America is the minimum Life expectancy in years.
